episodes.title: Cults 101 with Mike King & More!
episodes.description:
Pick up Deceived, tell Mike it's due to this interview and he will personalize and sign it for you!
https://www.paypal.com/ncp/payment/VBGCSL58HYNHE

Subscribe to Profiling Evil:
https://www.youtube.com/profilingevil

PODCAST - Mapping Evil:
https://esriaustralia.com.au/mapping-evil-podcast

Want to help fund my work by donating with Patreon or Paypal, or buying merchandise?  Visit https://www.LordanArts.com today.

Have a case to suggest?  Fill out the form here:
https://www.brainscratchers.com/suggest-a-case

This video is not intended to act as a means of proving or disproving anything related to the investigation or potential charges associated to the investigation.
